name: Cantonese-Style Fish And Thousand-Year Egg Congee
author: Mary
summary: This congee will warm your body, heart, and soul on a cold winter's day!
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked rice, rinsed in cold water
1 ½ teaspoons very thinly sliced ginger root  (Optional)
2  preserved thousand-year eggs, cut into small pieces
1 (4 ounce) cod fillet, cut into thin slices
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Combine water, chicken broth, and rice in a pot; bring to a boil
Cook, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking, until rice is fluffy, about 1 hour 30 minutes
Combine cod slices, rice wine, sesame oil, soy sauce, and white pepper in a bowl
Add to the pot; cook until tender, about 5 minutes
Ladle congee into serving bowls; garnish with green onion
